actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration And Border Security.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Immigration and Border Security

official_title: To authorize the Secretary of State to issue up to 10,500 E-3 visas per year to nationals of the Republic of Korea (South).
short_title: United States-Korea Free Trade Agreement Fairness Act of 2013

summary.text: United States-Korea Free Trade Agreement Fairness Act of 2013 - Amends the Immigration and Nationality Act to include nationals of the Republic of Korea (South Korea) coming to the United States under a treaty of commerce to perform specialty occupation services in the nonimmigrant E-3 visa category. Authorizes up to 10,500 of such visas to be issued each fiscal year.

titles.title: United States-Korea Free Trade Agreement Fairness Act of 2013
To authorize the Secretary of State to issue up to 10,500 E-3 visas per year to nationals of the Republic of Korea (South).
